description: Intents that MUST ship. All axes specified, verifiable, bounded.

intents.text: When user clicks the 'Add to Cart' button, the selected product is added to the cart state and the cart icon badge updates to show the new item count.
intents.rationale: Clear trigger (click), explicit state mutation (cart state), observable outcome (badge update). All axes present.

intents.text: The login form validates email format on blur and displays 'Invalid email' below the field if the format is incorrect.
intents.rationale: Specific trigger (blur), validation state implied, specific error message outcome.

intents.text: When the user submits the contact form with valid data, a success toast appears for 3 seconds with the message 'Message sent!'.
intents.rationale: Explicit trigger, implicit state, specific outcome with duration.

intents.text: The product list page displays products in a 3-column grid on desktop (>1024px) and a single column on mobile (<768px).
intents.rationale: Conditional trigger (breakpoints), layout state, specific measurable outcome.

intents.text: When user toggles dark mode in settings, all pages update their background to #1a1a1a and text to #ffffff.
intents.rationale: Explicit trigger, state change, specific verifiable outcome (hex colors).

intents.text: The search input debounces user input by 300ms before triggering a search, and displays 'Searching...' during the debounce period.
intents.rationale: Specific timing trigger, explicit state, observable outcome.

intents.text: When the user clicks 'Delete Account', a confirmation modal appears with 'Cancel' and 'Delete' buttons. Clicking 'Delete' removes the user from local storage and redirects to /goodbye.

analysis.trigger: click Delete Account, then click Delete in modal

intents.rationale: Multi-step trigger, explicit state mutations, specific redirect path.

intents.text: The pricing page shows 3 tier cards: 'Basic' at $9/mo, 'Pro' at $29/mo, and 'Enterprise' with 'Contact Us' instead of a price.
intents.rationale: Enumerated items, specific values, no ambiguity.

intents.text: When the user's session expires (after 30 minutes of inactivity), they are redirected to /login with the query parameter ?expired=true.
intents.rationale: Specific timing, explicit state tracking requirement, verifiable redirect.

intents.text: The image gallery displays thumbnails in a row. Clicking a thumbnail updates the main image display to show that image at 800x600 resolution.

analysis.outcome: main image updates with specific dimensions

intents.rationale: Clear trigger, state update, specific measurable outcome (dimensions).
